string.text: Vy majecie postać čałavieka, jaki nikoli nia bačyŭ ni hrama čornaha porachu ci hary. Vy ŭ słušnym miescy?
Voch, vy viarnulisia. Jakija naviny prynieśli?
Viartajciesia da mianie, kali budziecie mieć naviny.
Vy znajšli {ROGUE_ENGINEER_NAME}?
Iznoŭ vy, čaho žadajecie?
Ja žadaju nabyć harmaty.
Ja žadaju rekrutavać inžynieraŭ.
Jak ja mahu vykarystoŭvać harmaty?
Jak ja mahu nabyć bolej harmat?
Pakul ničoha, ja mušu iści.
Ja pierahladzieŭ vašuju prapanovu, i žadaju dapamahčy.
Vitaju Inžynier-Majstar, ja {PlAYERNAME}. Ja šukaju dostup da kuźniaŭ Nulna. Vy možacie dapamahčy?
Tak, ja. Ja {?PLAYER.GENDER}pryjšła{?}pryjšoŭ{\?} šukać dostup da zbroi čornaha porachu.
Cha! Zdajecca, vy navat nia viedajecie, što rabić ź imi. Što vam treba ad našych vyrabaŭ?
Ja zanadta zaniaty dziela hetaha, preč z maich vačej.
Heta najmahutnaja zbroja Impieryi, jana nia raz strymlivała nacisk ciemry. My nie razdajom našyja stvareńni ŭsiakamu, chto zojdzie da nas, ja nia viedaju vas. I vy nie zasłužyli našaha davieru.

Ale my možam pryjści da ahulnaj uhody, isnuje ŭnutranaja sprava, jakaja patrabuje chutkaha vyrašeńnia, i ja nie mahu dziejničać. Kali vy dapamožycie, u jakaści asabistaj pasłuhi, ja pahladžu, što mahu zrabić dziela vas. Što skažycie?
Što ja mušu zrabić?
Ja nia maju času na hetaje.

Zvyčajna my nie prybiahajem da čužoj dapamohi, ale nam brakuje srodkaŭ. Z Kuźniaŭ Nulna byli skradzienyja važnyja kampanienty, i ich treba viarnuć. Nieadkładna. Kali vy zmožacie vysačyć hetych uciekačoŭ i znajści častki, my zmožam pahavaryć dalej.
Zmahu, ale kali našaja ŭhoda zastaniecca raniejšaj. Ja znajdu ich dziela vas, a vy naŭzamien zabiaśpiečycie mnie dostup da Kuźniaŭ Nulna.
Kali heta adziny šlach atrymańnia dostupa da kuźniaŭ, niachaj budzie tak. Ja pryniasu ichnija hałovy.
Bajusia, nie, ja maju inšyja spravy.
Tady damovilisia, miarkuju, ja viedaju ichniaje miescavańnie. Ja adznaču jaho na vašaj mapie, niachaj Zihmar nakiruje ciabie, {?PLAYER.GENDER}čužynka{?}čužyniec{\?}.
Ja razumieju, viarnusia, kali budu mieć naviny.
Heta ŭsio, što dla hetaha treba. Hučyć dosyć lohka.
Ja nia maju času dla hetaha.
Fajna, čakaju stanoŭčych vynikaŭ i chutkaha viartańnia.
Kryŭdna, padumajcie znoŭ i viartajciesia, kali źmienicie dumku.
Na žal, ja {?PLAYER.GENDER}nie zmahła{?}nia zmoh{\?} prynieści zapytanaje vami.
Ccc, ja čakaŭ lepšaha. Mahčyma, jašče majecca čas, i vy zmožacie adsačyć ich, kali budziecie {?PLAYER.GENDER}imklivaj{?}imklivym{\?}.
Ja nie rasčaruju vas u druhi raz.
Na žal, ja nie mahu zrabić hetaje zaraz.
Ja viarnuŭsia, ale biez skradzienych kampanientaŭ, bajusia skazać, ale jany dahetul stračanyja.
Razumieju, heta nie toje, na što ja spadziavaŭsia. Ci byli jašče niejkija začepki, ci dapytvali vy hetych niahodnikaŭ?
Adzin z bandytaŭ nazvaŭ imia, zdajecca {ROGUE_ENGINEER_NAME}?

Viadoma! Kali vy zhodnyja, ja znoŭ zapytaju vašuju dapamohu. Sprava moža apynucca bolš surjoznaj, čym ja mierkavaŭ. {ROGUE_ENGINEER_NAME} - inžynier, prytym dobry, ale jaho pracy zaŭždy zdavalisia... chibnymi.
Kali jon skraŭ hetyja častki, to tolki dla niečaha žudasnaha. Ja vinien prasić vas adšukać jaho i spynić varjactva, jakoje jon sprabuje prydumać. Vy zrobicie hetaje?
Spačatku ja mušu adsačyć uciekačoŭ.
Zrazumieła, viartajciesia da mianie, kali budziecie mieć štości karysnaje.
{ROGUE_ENGINEER_NAME} bolej nia budzie prablemaj, i ja viarnuŭ skradzienaje. Ja nia viedaju, što jon žadaŭ ź imi zrabić.

Heta nia maje značeńnia, biez sumnievu, toje było čymści pierakručanym. Ja mušu adziakavać vas za vašyja vysiłki i vašuju abačlivaść. Jak i było abumoŭlena, zaraz vy možacie atrymlivać dostup da našych liciejniaŭ i nabyvać u nas usio, što pažadajecie.
Ciapier, čym ja mahu dapamahčy?
Ja dahetul adsočvaju jaho.
Zrazumieła, viartajciesia da mianie, kali budziecie mieć lepšyja naviny.
Viadoma, u vas vy znojdziecie tolki najlepšaje z Kuźniaŭ Nulna!
Što jašče ja mahu zrabić dziela vas?
Dvoje našych inžynieraŭ-navikoŭ hatovyja dałučycca da vas za adpaviedny košt ({RECRUITMENT_PRICE}).
Sardečna zaprašajem na bort.
Zaraz mnie brakuje hrošaŭ na ich.
Kali padumać, to, mahčyma, paźniej.
Kab nabyć harmaty vy musicie słužyć Impierskamu Hrafu-Elektaru.
Kolkaść harmat, jakuju moža mieć vašaje palavoje vojska, pavialičvajecca za kožnyja 50 roŭniej navyka Inžynieryja.
Kali vy adpaviadajecie hetym patrabavańniam, prosta pahavarycie sa mnoj, i ja pakažu, što maju.
Harmaty ŭstaloŭvajucca z dapamohaj Režyma vykarystańnia zaklonaŭ, ale dla stralby z harmat patrebna naniać prynamsi dvuch harmatnikaŭ.
Taksama patrebna pierakanacca, što harmata znachodzicca ŭva invientary partyi.
Inžyniery i Harmatniki mohuć stralać z harmataŭ.
{ROGUE_ENGINEER_NAME} byŭ pravy, jany dasłali kahości pa nas! Chutka chapajcie zbroju!
Pačakajcie, ja prosta pryjšoŭ za skradzienymi častkami, niama patreby lić kroŭ. Moža damovimsia?
Kidajcie svaju zbroju, i ja paškaduju vašyja žyćci.
Sa zbrojaj ci nie, my źniščym vas usich i viarniom skradzienaje vami!
Vy nie padmanicie nas! Jany buduć słužyć vialikaj mecie! Vy nie zabiarecie ich!
Takim čynam, stary durań dasłaŭ ciabie za mnoj? Jak jon vyličyŭ mianie? Niavažna, ty budzieš stajać na šlachu maich stvareńniaŭ. Ty pamreš tut!
Vašyja schiemy skončacca tut.
Hrafstvy Vampiraŭ
Impieryja Ludziej
Bretońnija

Hrafy-Vampiraŭ - vyradki, jakija nia majuć roŭnych. Jany imknucca zrynuć cyvilizacyju žyvych i pabudavać na jaje miescy impieryju Niežyci. Kožny vampir - unikalnaja i vieličnaja postać sa svajoj indyvidualnaściu, imknieńniami i ambicyjami. U adroźnieńni ad ich, ichnija pasłuhačy pakorliva padparadkoŭvajucca im: šerah za šeraham - patrapanyja i pakrytyja brudam trupy, viernutyja da žyćcia mocaj niekramantyi svaich vaładaroŭ.

Impieryja Ludziej - vieličeznaja čałaviečaja nacyja ŭ Starym Śviecie, jakaja viadzie štodzionnaje zmahańnie za vyžyvańnie. Vojski Impieryi, što ŭznačalvaje Karł Franc, śviedčać pra niepachisnuju dyscyplinu i daskanałaje bajavoje majsterstva. U śviecie, što pierapoŭnieny lutymi dzikunami i kryvažernymi pačvarami, Impieryja vyžyvaje dziakujučy znakamitaj dyscyplinie svaich vojskaŭ, vyvostranaj surovymi rychtoŭlami i ŭzmocnienaj niepachisnaj vieraj u Zihmara. Zjaŭlajučysia majakom čałavieckaj tryvałaści, sałdaty Impieryi słužać prykładam niaŭpynnaha ducha čałavieka, što pieramahaje siarod biaskoncych vorahaŭ.

Bretońskaje Karaleŭstva - kraj, słavuty mahutnymi rycarami i ichnim silnym pačyćciom rycarstva. Fej Čaradziejka i Cnatliŭki Łedzi ŭznačalvajuć pracavitych pryhonnych i šlachietnych łordaŭ, što baraniać lud ad šmatlikich niebiaśpiekaŭ, pahražajučych ich žyćciam. Padčas vajny ŭsio karaleŭstva moža abjadnacca i adpravicca ŭ kryžovy pachod suprać vorahaŭ pad čałom Karala Łua Lionkiora, jakoha dahetul nia zmoh pieramahčy nivodny vorah.

Muziljon, praklataje vaładarstva, źmiescavanaje ŭ samym sercy Bretońnii, što adkidvaje zmročnuju i złaviesnuju cieniu na ziemlu. Niekali hanarlivaje hiercahstva, zaraz słužyć panurym śviedkam razbeščanaści, što chavajecca ŭ cieni. Heta panstva bahnaŭ i zaraśnikaŭ, jakoje ŭznačalvaje Zmiej Muziljona, mocna kantrastuje ź jaskravym nastrojem šlachietnaj Bretońnii. Jašče bolš trahična i tryvožna vyhladaje mutavaŭšaje pryhońnictva, jakim kirujuć nie šlachietnyja rycary, a sapsavanaja niežyć, čornyja rycary, jakija zjaŭlajucca pałochajučaj dušu miešaninaj tradycyjnaj Bretońskaj vajarskaj advahi i niačystaj mocy.
łord
łedzi
Vampir-Łord
Vampir-Łedzi
łord
łedzi
łord
łedzi
Šcirland
Tałabekland
Paŭrośliki
Šcirland
Tałabekland
Paŭrośliki
Bretońnija
Bretońnija
Bretońskaja
Bretońskaja
Hetym ja klanusia słužyć Hrand Hrafu Avierlanda.
Ja abviaščaju Hrafa-Elektara, Maryŭsa Lajtdorfa svaim zakonnym haspadarom i lepšym za Kurta Chełborynha.
Ja budu baranić svaim miačom pacałavanyja soncam ziemli Avierlanda, jaho ludziej, žyviołu, i pierš za ŭsio, sałodkija viny.
Ja vyznaju vas Svaim Haspadarom i Vyratavalnikam, i pajdu ŭśled za vami da samych hłybiń piekła dy nazad, i znoŭ u piekła dy... kchm - nazad.
Hetym ja klanusia ŭ viernaści Hrand Hrafu Šcirlanda.
Ja vyznaju Albierycha Haŭpt-Andersana Hrand Hrafam Šcirlanda, Pryncam Vurtbada i Vaładarom Silvanii, svaim haspadarom i panam da samaj śmierci.
Niachaj majo cieła budzie ščytom Šcirlanda dziela abarony ad pahrozy niežyci.
Ja pajdu za vami ŭ samyja hłubokija krai miortvych ziamiel.
Hetym u klanusia ŭ viernaści Nuln, Bastyjonu Poŭdnia i Žamčužynie Impieryi, i mieńšym navakolnym vioskam, zamkam i haradam Vissenlanda.
Ja vyznaju Emanuel fon Libvic, Hrand Hrafiniu Vissenlanda, Hrafiniu Nulna i Hiercahiniu Majssena, svajoj viečnaj panaj.
U časy vostraj patreby, ja budu baranić Nuln u mieru svaich siłaŭ i mahčymaściaŭ.
Ja abiacaju iści za vami, kudy b vy nie pajšli, i budu baranić vas da śmierci.
Hetym ja klanusia nieśmiarotnaj addanaściu da Hrand Hiercaha Tałabeklanda.
Ja vyznaju Hielmuta Fojerbacha, Hrand Hiercaha Tałabeklanda, Markhrafa Uschodniaj Marki i Ŭmiłavanaha Taala svaim viečnym haspadarom.
U časy patreby ja budu baranić Taalbaston da apošniaha ŭzdycha.
Ja budu dapamahać vam u abaronie śviatoj ziamli Taala da apošnich dzion.

Hetym ja klanusia ŭ viečnym słužeńni Rajklandu i jaho suvierenu Karłu Francu fon Cholšvih-Šlištajnu, Zachiśniku Impieryi, Zmaharu z Ciemraj, Spadčyńniku Zihmara, Impierataru Poŭdnia i Synu Impierataraŭ.
Ja addaju svaju dušu bohu-vajaru Zihmaru, chaj jaho vorahi paznajuć maju lutaść.
Niachaj vašyja vorahi pryznajuć mianie svaim stałym voraham, bo pokul majo cieła dychaje, ja nie supakojusia.
Chvała Karłu Francu, za jakim ja pajdu ŭ hłybini biezdani.
Hetym ja klanusia słužyć Hrand Hrafu Muutlanda.
Ja abviaščaju starejšynu Hizme Advažnaje Serca svaim zakonnym haspadarom.
Ja trymaju svoj mieč, kab baranić ludziej ad niežyci.
Ja biaru abaviazak dapamahać vam u miry i vajnie.
Ja addaju svaju dušu ŭva viečnaje rabstva kraju Silvanija.
Hetym ja klanusia ŭ nieparušnaści svajoj addanaści da Manfreda fon Karštajna, Hrafa Silvanii, najchitraha i najadoranaha mahijaj vampira z usich kryŭnych linijaŭ fon Karštajnaŭ.
Niachaj vašyja vorahi dryžać pry maim vidzie i maich lehijonaŭ niežyci.
Ja dałučajusia da vašaha pałacu i pajdu ŭśled za vami ŭ hłybini ziamiel impieryi.
Z honaram, ja klanusia ŭ viernaści da vieličnaha Hiercahstva Akvitań.
Ja budu śledavać nastaŭleńniam šanoŭnaha Hiercaha Armo, uzora rycarstva i dabračynnaści.
Ja paśviačaju svoj mieč abaronie ŭradlivych paloŭ Akvitani, jaje narodu i bahaćciu rycarskich tradycyjaŭ.
Jak {?PLAYER.GENDER}addanaja rycarka{?}addany rycar{\?}, ja budu stojka supraćstajać usiakamu vorahu, zachoŭvajučy honar i vytančanaść, ułaścivyja Akvitani.
Z honaram i cichmianaściu ja paśviačaju siabie słužbie šlachietnamu Bastonskamu Hiercahstvu.
Ja zajaŭlaju pra svaju addanaść da hanarovaha Hiercaha Baemunda, majaka advahi i rycarstva.
Ja budu baranić kraj Bastonn, jaje chrabrych rycaraŭ i lehiendarnyja śviatyje ziemli našaj Vaziornaj Łedzi.
Jak {?PLAYER.GENDER}sapraŭdnaja rycarka{?}sapraŭdny rycar{\?} Bastońni, ja budu adstojvać rycarskija dabračynnaści i advahu, baroniačy panstva i jaho šanoŭnyja tradycyi.
Z vialikim honaram, ja klanusia ŭ viernaści da vieličnaha Bordulskaha Hiercahstva.
Ja zajaŭlaju pra svaju addanaść da Hiercaha Albieryka, dalnabačnaha lidara, čyja ciaha da roskvitu i viadzieńnia vojnaŭ nia viedaje sabie roŭnych pad uładaj našaj Łedzi.
Ja klanusia baranić uradlivyja vinahradniki Bordulu, jaho žycharoŭ i vino.
U imia rycarstva i dobleści ja rušu ŭ darohu jak {?PLAYER.GENDER}sapraŭdnaja rycarka{?}sapraŭdny rycar{\?} Bordulu, kab baranić našyja ziemli svaim žyćciom.
Z honaram i pakoraj ja klanusia ŭva addanaści da šlachietnaha Bryjonskaha Hiercahstva.
Ja abviaščaju pra svaju viernaść da Hiercaha Tyadoryka, mudraha i spraviadlivaha haspadara, jakoha lubiać jaho paddanyja.
Ja budu zaścierahać ziemli Bryjonna, jaho žycharoŭ i mahutnyja zamki, što ŭpryhožvajuć viaskovaje navakolle.

Jak {?PLAYER.GENDER}sapraŭdnaja rycarka{?}sapraŭdny rycar{\?} Bryjonna, ja budu adstojvać dobradziejnaść honaru i łajalnaści, baroniačy našaje hiercahstva ad tych, chto pahražaje jaho pryhažości i majsterstvu.
Hetym ja klanusia ŭva nieparušnaj łajalnaści da doblesnaha Karkassonskaha Hiercahstva.
Ja abviaščaju pra svaju addanaść da Hiercaha Chiubulda, advažnaha lidara, čyi dziei natchniajuć usich nas.
Ja klanusia zaścierahać pali Karkassona, jaho chrabrych rycaraŭ i daśviedčanyja vojski.
Jak {?PLAYER.GENDER}viernaja{?}vierny{\?} abaronca Karkassona, ja budu ćviorda stajać na varcie honaru i dobleści našaha ŭpadabanaha panstva.
Ja klanusia ŭ svajoj niepachisnaj viernaści da šlachietnaha Munforskaha Hiercahstva.
Ja abviaščaju pra svaju addanaść da Hiercaha Folkara, advažnaha lidara, čyja advaha ćviordaja jak šmatlikija hory, jakimi jon kiruje.
Ja klanusia zaścierahać vieličnyja ziemli Munfora, jaho narod i vysokija zamki, jakija zjaŭlajucca symbalam našaj mocy.
Z nieparušnaj viernaściu ja budu słužyć jak {?PLAYER.GENDER}sapraŭdnaja rycarka{?}sapraŭdny rycar{\?} Munfora, z kožnym uzdycham baranić honar i suvierenitet našaha haspadarstva.
Hetym ja klanusia ŭ viernaści da vybitnaha Parravunskaha Hiercahstva.
Ja klanusia ŭ viernaści da Hiercaha Kaśsiona, doblesnaha abaroncy našych horaŭ i lasoŭ.
Ja budu baranić śviatyja ziemli Parravuna, jaho narod i jaho šanoŭnych piehasaŭ.
Jak {?PLAYER.GENDER}addanaja rycarka{?}addany rycar{\?} Parravuna, ja budu stajać jak majak nadziei, baroniačy našaje haspadarstva i padtrymlivaja spadkajemstva našaha hiercahstva.
Z honaram i pakoraj ja klanusia ŭva addanaści šlachietnamu Kunelskamu Hiercahstvu.
Ja abviaščaju pra svaju łajalnaść da Hiercaha Tonkreda II, mudraha i rašučaha lidara, jaki natchniaje ŭsich nas.
Ja klanusia baranić kraj Kunel, jaho žycharoŭ i śviatyja chramy, što ušanoŭvajuć Vaziornuju Łedzi.
Jak {?PLAYER.GENDER}sapraŭdnaja rycarka{?}sapraŭdny rycar{\?} Kunela, ja budu prytrymlivacca rycarskich ideałaŭ, baranić našaje vaładarstva i zachoŭvać jaho stałuju hracyju i pryhažość.
Ja, {?PLAYER.GENDER}ścipłaja rycarka{?}ścipły rycar{\?}, klanusia ŭ svajoj niepachisnaj viernaści da Muziljonskaha Haspadarstva.
Ja klanusia słužyć vaładaru Hiercahstva, Zmieju, i dałučacca da cieniaŭ, što achutvajuć hetuju ziemlu.
Ja budu baranić nasielnikaŭ Muziljona i zabytych duchaŭ, jakija chavajucca ŭ ciemry.
Ja vyznaju vas, svaim suvierennym šlachcičam, i budu rašuča stajać pierad tvaram pahardy śvietu da našaha domu, abjadnaŭšysia pad vašym ściaham.
Hetym ja klanusia ŭ svajoj viernaści da Vałacha Charkona, Orda Drakonisa i svaich paplečnikaŭ rycaraŭ.
Ja klanusia svaim lazom całkam źniščyć čałaviectva i ŭsich inšych, chto vystupaje suprać ułady vampiraŭ.
Niachaj ja zaŭždy budu spatalać prahu kryvi svajho miača i šukać našych najvybitnych vorahaŭ.
Ja nikoli nie adstuplu z bitvy i budu addany vam ci paniasu vyniki zdrady.

Ja abviaščaju vas {?PLAYER.GENDER}šlachciankaj{?}šlachcičam{\?} Impieryi. Vašaje žyćcio i majomaść buduć baranicca našymi zakonami i nia mohuć być adniaty ŭ vas inačaj jak pa zakonu. Vy možacie słužyć čynoŭnikam u haradach i vioskach i hienierałam vojska, kali my vas zakličam da hetaha.
Ja abviaščaju vas {?PLAYER.GENDER}šlachciankaj{?}šlachcičam{\?} Silvanii i słuhoj fon Karštajnaŭ. Vy musicie vykonvać našyja zahady i bracca za zbroju padčas vajny.
Ja ŭskładvaju na vas {PLAYER.NAME} vialikija nadziei. Ja viedaju, što vy budziecie vartyja davieru, jakoje ja vam akazaŭ.
Sardečna zaprašaju ŭ Orda Drakonis {PLAYER.NAME}. Voś maje paśladoŭniki, niachaj jany dapamohuć tabie ŭ bitvie. Biary hetaje lazo.
Hraf-Elektar Impieryi
Hrafinia-Elektar Impieryi
Hrand Majstar Kryvavych Drakonaŭ
Vampir-Łord Silvanii
Vampir-Łedzi Silvanii
Hiercah Bretońnii
Hiercahinia Bretońnii
Hiercah Muziljona
Hiercahinia Muziljona
Ja {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z domu {CLAN_NAME}.
Ja {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z domu {CLAN_NAME}. Našaja siamja słužyć Impieryi pakaleńniami.
Ja {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z domu {CLAN_NAME}. Našaja siamja z honaram vykonvaje svaje abaviazki z časoŭ samoha Zihmara.

Ja {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z domu {CLAN_NAME}. Chacia nia varta zanadta hanarycca svaim radavodam, z radaściu havaru, my zaŭždy surjozna stavilisia da svajho abaviazku pa abaronie prostych ludziej Impieryi.
Ja {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z domu {CLAN_NAME}, adnoha z najsłavutych radavodaŭ u letapisach Impieryi.

Ja {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z domu {CLAN_NAME}, adnoha z najsłavutych radavodaŭ u letapisach Impieryi. Jakoje žyćcio najlepšaje? Kryšyć svaich vorahaŭ. Bačyć, jak ich honiać pierad taboj. I čuć hałašeńni ichnich žančyn.
Viedaj, što kali ty choć adnojčy pierojdzieš mnie šlach, to stanieš niežyvym miasam u našych vojskach.
Ja {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z {CLAN_NAME}.
Ja {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z {CLAN_NAME}. Biez sumnievu, vy čuli, jak sałdaty Impieryi ŭ žachie šepčuć imia našaha kłanu.
Ja {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z {CLAN_NAME}. Našy kłan addana słuža fon Karštajnam pakaleńniami.
Pryjemna sustrecca, ja {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z {CLAN_NAME}.
Pryjemna sustrecca, ja {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z {CLAN_NAME}. Maja siamja słužyć narodu Bretońnii i Łedzi pakaleńniami.
Ja {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z {CLAN_NAME}. Chodźma, budź ty siabrom ci voraham, pryjdzi i daj mnie pačuć, što vy žadajecie skazać.
Ja {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z {CLAN_NAME}. Moj łord nakazvaje mnie nie škadavać nikoha, i vy zdajeciesia pahrozaj da majoj spravy.
Ja {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z {CLAN_NAME}. Havary chutka, ja nia maju ciarpieńnia da tych, chto maje maleńkija ambicyi.
Chto advažyŭsia stać pierada mnoj, {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z {CLAN_NAME}. Pieony, žabraki i bajaźliŭcy nia majuć prava chadzić pa ziamle, pa jakoj chadžu ja. Havary ci budzieš zabity.
Ja {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z domu {CLAN_NAME}.
Vy staicie pierad mnoj, {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z {CLAN_NAME}.
Vy staicie pierad mnoj, {CONVERSATION_CHARACTER.LINK} z {CLAN_NAME}. Vy zdajeciesia zdolnym supiernikam, dobraja sustreča.

You arrive at an active chaos portal. The vile thing pulses with arcane magic, chaos forces are invading in minor numbers from their realm.
The portal lies dormant. Come back at a later time.
Attempt to defeat the chaos forces present and close the portal.
You arrive at a beastmen herdstone. A raging signal fire is lit to gather warbands to the warherd gathering here.
The herdstone camp is empty, come back at a later time.
Attempt to defeat the bestmen warherd in the heart of their bloodgrounds.
You arrive at a beastmen herdstone. A raging signal fire is lit to gather warbands to the warherd gathering here.
The herdstone camp is empty, come back at a later time.
Attempt to defeat the bestmen warherd in the heart of their bloodgrounds.
You arrive at a shrine of the {RELIGION_LINK}. Pilgrims from the surrounding settlements are praying to the God-King.
The shrine lies in ruins. There is nothing to do here.
You arrive at a shrine of the {RELIGION_LINK}. Pilgrims from the surrounding settlements are praying to the God-King.
The shrine lies in ruins. There is nothing to do here.
You arrive at a shrine of the {RELIGION_LINK}. Pilgrims from the surrounding settlements are praying to the God-King.
The shrine lies in ruins. There is nothing to do here.
You arrive at a shrine of the {RELIGION_LINK}. Pilgrims from the surrounding settlements are praying to the God of Nature.
The shrine lies in ruins. There is nothing to do here.
You arrive at a grove of the {RELIGION_LINK}. Pilgrims from the surrounding settlements are praying to the Lady of the Lake.
The shrine lies in ruins. There is nothing to do here.
You arrive at a grove of the {RELIGION_LINK}. Pilgrims from the surrounding settlements are praying to the Lady of the Lake.
The shrine lies in ruins. There is nothing to do here.
Verhungern by local Slyvanians, this dispersed land is a ghoul, and likely spirit, infested maze of briars and bogs. Only the insane or desperate would venture into its boughs.
You shouldnt see this.

Destroyed by unholy fire that rained from the skies eons ago, Hel Fenn is likely the most cursed area in the whole Reik Basin. Molded buildings, rotting trees and tar covered corpses dot the desolate landscape. This was also the site of Mannfred von Carsteins defeat and the end of the Vampire Wars.
You shouldnt see this.

Long have the hills southeast of Talabheim been cursed. Strangeness and tragedy are no stranger to that land. Despite this, no one knows what the cause of the miasma is; though not for lack of trying.
You shouldnt see this.

Centuries ago, the hills outside of Mousillon were used as a mass grave to bury the thousands who died of Red Pox. So many victims were there that to this day the soil covering their pits is visible from the city walls. The air here is sometimes poisonous and like the rest of the cursed land the long dead rest uneasily.
You shouldnt see this.
My story? Sure, I can share it.
As a boy I discovered I was not like most children, it was not long before the colleges realised this as well.
Once my affinity for Aqshy was known, I was ripped from my peasant life and become an initiate within the Colleges in Altdorf.
That fire in Altdorf a few years back that started in a tavern? Definitely wasnt me!.
Most interesting.
I am a licensed Bright Wizard from the Colleges in Altdorf. Im sure by now you have met a few of us and may know how powerful we can be.
The story of my life is insignificant, but I will speak.
I was an Orphan left at the doors of the Church, the Cult of Sigmar took me in and raised me.
I have studied many holy scriptures and dedicated my life to the never-ending battle against the filth of Chaos.
I roam the countryside and purge heresy with unwavering determination.
This has my consent.
Have you finished?
Im a warrior priest of Sigmar and no corruption will escape my wrath.
It is not much of a tale, but I will speak of my life.
My mother worked in a brothel, we barely had enough to eat. Never knew my father.
I had to learn to defend myself from drunken clients at a very young age. My mother wouldnt leave no matter how much I begged her.
One day things went too far, one of her clients was trying to take her life in some kind of strange ritual. I stole his knife and ended it, soon after I left and joined the Templars.
You are doing Sigmars work!
That is downright pitiful.
I am a Witch Hunter, a Templar of Sigmar. The guilty cannot escape me.
My story isnt that unique, but I dont mind talking about it.
I was born the child of a hedge wizard, when I too showed magical affinity I was sent to the Colleges.
I was always top of my classes. The others accused me of hubris, but they were merely blinded by their mediocrity.
You cannot find a more promising wizard in the realms of the Empire. I am on the path to surpass Balthazar Gelt himself!
I see.
Pff, how ridiculous.
I am a Light Wizard from the Imperial Colleges. I have no doubts that you have heard of our immense skill.
My story isnt that unique, but I dont mind talking about it.
I was born the child of a hedge wizard, when I too showed magical affinity I was sent to the Colleges.
I was always top of my classes. The others accused me of hubris, but they were merely blinded by their mediocrity.
You cannot find a more promising wizard in the realms of the Empire. I am on the path to surpass Balthazar Gelt himself!
I see.
Pff, how ridiculous.
I am a Celestial Wizard from the Imperial Colleges. I have no doubts that you have heard of our immense skill.
I was born into a family of serfs, but working the fields was no life for me!
I became the apprentice of a master alchemist, but the bastard taught me nothing yet worked me to death for years.
I left him on the side of the road when his wagon broke down one day and joined the army where I learned to maintain equipment. Explosives are my newly found passion.
Most interesting.
Have you finished?
I am an Engineer experienced in the operation and maintenance of gunpowder weapons.
Who I am is second to what I do, I tend to those in need.
It has always been my calling to help the sick and wounded, my parents died when I was young and I do not wish for others to experience such pain.
I dedicated my life to Shallya, in return I have been given a gift for healing others.
Since I have been travelling the Empire, looking to where my skills are needed most. Tending to peasant and soldier alike.
I see.
I understant.
I am a Priestess of the Goddess Shallya, dedicated to the arts of healing.
You dont need to know my story stranger, just my skills.
Im a Court Huntsman, well. I was. Lets just say I missed my mark by the rump of a noble.
Now I track, hunt and do mercenary work for coin.
I have hunted all manner of beast and beastmen, even the occasional orc. My skills go to the highest bidder.
I am a Huntsman, many monsters have been slain by my hand in service of the Empire.
Hm, you wish to know of my life? It is a tale I can share.
I have always been surrounded by death, death is everything in Sylvania.
My fate was never to join the undead roaming the land, but to control them. To raise them and bend them to my will.
It has taken time but the dead do my bidding and my powers are ever growing.
I couldnt really care less about your wretched origin.
I am a master of death and undeath, many fear me. Do you?
I do not remember much of my past life, there is only the now and the thirst.
Being human feels like a dream, a dream I was happily liberated from.
I was taken from my village for the blood tax, but instead I became the desire of my vampire master. I was blessed with the gift of Nagash
My master however perished during the vampire wars, with no one else I have been left to wander the night since.
I couldnt really care less about your wretched origin.
Im a fledgeling Vampire, powerful and undying.
Shattered memories, warrior, soldier? So long ago.
Much is lost, bloodshed, battle, death.
I serve, I fight, I destroy.
I see.
I am a Wight King, servant in death.
Ah, Youd like to hear my story? Very well.
As you eyes can clearly see, I am a vampire countess.
However, I sit and wait to see if anybody here is worthy of my time, as tending to the politics of Nefertatas brood bores me to no end.
And trust me, if you are interested, my services will indeed be very valuable
I suppose
Well, what do you say then?.
I am a Lahmian countess, and not only can I hold myself in battle, but I would be great use to you during travel.
I have no qualms speaking of my life stranger.
I was born into a noble family from Carcassonne, my father was a Knight before me.
It is my duty to become a Knight and I am currently on my quest to gain the favour of the Lady.
I have only just set out on my journey, I have much to learn.
I hope you will achieve what you set out to do.
You shouldnt have wandered so far from home.
I am a questing Knight, devoted in life to the Lady and Bretonnia.
Who I am is second to what I do, I tend to those in need.
It has always been my calling to help the sick and wounded, and like many others, I was rescued and trained for my affinity with the winds of magic.
I dedicated my life to the Lady, in return I have been given a gift for aiding her knights.
Since then I have been travelling the lands, looking to where my skills are needed most and tending to peasant and soldier alike.
I see.
I understand.
Hmmph. Youd like to hear my story?
I was one of those questing knights a long time ago, dedicating my entire life for that damned Lady.
But years pass, quest after quest, kill after kill, she still does not think Im worthy! The bastard!
So now I no longer follow that road of religion and lip service, I instead look for whoever has the heaviest pouch of coin.
Very intruiging.
I hope that is the only thing youre looking for.
Well, dont waste my time.
I was still once a Brettonian knight, if you need anything to be slain, I am your warrior.

The Cult of Sigmar, also sometimes called the Church of Sigmar, the Holy Temple of Sigmar, the Clergy of Sigmar or simply the Sigmarite Cult, is the state church of the Empire that administrates the worship of that realms patron god, Sigmar Heldenhammer. The Cult of Sigmar was founded by the wild-eyed friar Johann Helstrum in the year 73 IC, when he appeared before the masses to relate a vision that he experienced of Sigmar kneeling before Ulric, the god of war and winter, who placed the crown of godhood upon his brow as Sigmar took his place amongst the deities of the Old World Pantheon. As of today, the Cult of Sigmar has become an essential part of Imperial society. Nearly every city, town or village within the Empire has dedicated a portion of their wealth and land to the creation and maintenance of a Sigmarite temple, from which a priest of the Cult of Sigmar will attend to the spiritual well-being of its citizenry, whether it be through holy words of prayer or through heroic actions and trials by combat.

The Cult of Taal and Rhya is among the most ancient and pervasive in the Old World, tracing a direct line to the primal gods from the deepest of history. The cult grew organically, as early Humans tried to explain natural phenomenon, such as thunder, the turning of the seasons, and the rise and ebb of the seas. Over time, the Gods Taal and Rhya came into being, beginning as a single entity, known as Ishnernos. This split occurred many thousands of years ago, and the Cult of Ishnernos faded into distant memory. Taal rules nature and is considered King of the Gods. He claims the wild places as his domain and is primarily worshipped by hardy woodsmen, trackers, and rangers. Rhyas worshippers are found in the cultivated fields and orchards of the Empire, and are found among farmers, fishermen, and young lovers everywhere. The Cult of Taal and Rhya is the sanctioned cult of Talabecland, and is wildly popular in the eastern and northern parts of the Empire. Of the two, Taal receives most recognition, and Rhyas role is much diminished. The grand city of Talabheim is particularly fervent in its worship of both Taal and Rhya. However, in other cities, although Rhyas name is commonly known, he worship is rare, leading many urbanites to conclude that her cult is on the decline.

The Cult of the Lady of the Lake, or simply the Cult of the Lady, is a state-official religious cult that serves to follow and uphold the values set upon them by the Lady of the Lake, and to serve the interest of her and the Kingdom of Bretonnia. Since ancient times, the Bretonnians have worshipped the Lady of the Lake as their goddess and their primary deity, a figure of myth and legend who guides their Kings and protects their lands from harm. Worship of the Lady can be traced to the earliest days of the Kingdom. It is said that she arose from a Sacred Lake before Gilles le Breton and his Knightly Companions on the dawn of the Great Victory of Bordeleaux. Wreathed in a fey light, the Lady rose from the water bearing a Grail which overflowed with light that spilled into the waters of the lake, blessing the assembled knights until dawns light broke over the mountains.

Vampires of all kinds loathe the gods. They dont deny their existence, but they dont serve them, seeking to be their equal instead. The closest idea of a religion to vampires would be their shared recognition of Nagash as the creator of undeath. Ultimately, all vampires descend from him. Nagash, known by many names such as the Great Necromancer, the Great Betrayer, the Usurper, the Undying King, the Supreme Lord of Undeath or simply He Who Shall Not Be Named is the ultimate personification of death and the Undead, an ancient, evil being who sought to conquer this cruel, chaotic mortal world and bring about an age of Undeath that will rule for all eternity. Nagash is darkness and unreasoning hatred given form, the father and creator of the foul art of necromancy and lord of all Vampires. His every action and deed is self-serving, his achievement horrific and loathsome, and his every whim bent solely to ensure that no one shall ever deny nor challenge his right to rule ever again.

The term Chaos Undivided refers to a faction among the forces of Chaos that serves the pantheon of the major Chaos Gods as a whole rather than owing complete fealty to one over the others. It is often represented by the Everchosen of Chaos, the mortal Chaos Lord who is the greatest champion of all the major Chaos Gods. Followers of Chaos Undivided venerate the force of Chaos itself, sometimes as an entity that some insane scholars of the Old World name the Great Beast in which the major Chaos Gods are seen as a single deity whose four major constituent parts are to be worshipped equally as different emanations of the same universal force. At times, this entity sets aside its mad internal struggle, which is otherwise known as the Great Game, to make it possible for the fragmented armies of the major Chaos Gods to gather together under one banner, such as during the various Chaos incursions into the Known World like the Great War Against Chaos and the End Times. These moments cause the Old World to tremble and quake in fear and loathing.

Slaanesh, also known as the Dark Prince, the Prince of Pleasure, the Lord of Excess, the God of Obsession, the Serpent, the Master of Excess in All Things, the Perfect Prince and even the Prince of Chaos is the major Chaos God of pleasure, passion, obsession, excess, hedonism, decadence and pain. Born of mortal inspiration and desire, Slaanesh is the great muse, the fulfiller of dreams. He is passion given form. He is pleasure incarnate, from the intellectual satisfaction of a problem solved to the fulfilment of baser desires. His is the domain of frustration and agony, the struggle to achieve that which mortals covet. He is titillation. He is suffering. He is the sum of all mortal experience.

Nurgle, also known as the Plague Lord, Grandfather Nurgle, the Lord of Pestilence, the Fly Lord, the Urfather and the Crow among many other names is the major Chaos God of disease, decay, despair, destruction, death and rebirth. Nurgle is the Chaos God most directly involved with the plight of mortals, particularly Men, who suffer so acutely from a fear of death. He is the eldest of the four Chaos Gods and indeed is undoubtedly the oldest Chaos God of all, for the process of death and decay is as ancient as life itself. Nurgle is the embodiment of the constant cycle of death and rebirth which animates all life in the universe, and was brought into being by mortals fears of death and the despair they feel about their inevitable mortality from age and disease.

Khorne, also known as the Blood God, the Lord of Murder, the Lord of Skulls, Hunter of Souls and the Hound in Norsca, is the major Chaos God of war, hatred, wrath, rage, murder, blood, strength, courage and martial honour. Khorne is the second eldest of the major Ruinous Powers and his waxing strength in this time of constant conflict often renders him the mightiest of the Chaos Gods in his effect on the mortal world and in the Great Game between the gods. His domain encompasses the most basic and brutal of sentient emotions - hate, anger, rage, the desire for destruction and the joy of killing ones enemies. Every act of killing or murder in the mortal world feeds and empowers Khorne, the more senseless, vicious and bloodthirsty, the better.

Tzeentch, also known as the Changer of Ways, the Lord of Change, the Architect of Fate, the Wind-lord, the Raven God, and the Great Conspirator is the major Chaos God of change, evolution, ambition, intrigue, destiny, lies, trickery, sorcery, knowledge, and mutation. Though weary scholars of daemonology know this god by the name of Tzeentch, in truth, he exceeds all the other Ruinous Powers in his number of facets, names and aspects. For he is change, said to embody every mortal creatures recognition of, and desire, to change, to grow, to move, to seek more -- more knowledge, more wealth, more power. His face and form shifts and turns from eternity unto eternity.
the Lady
Ruinous Powers
Your party members heal their wounds 20% faster.
Increase your partys movement speed in forests by 20%.
Increase your partys morale by 20.
Earn 20% more xp from battles.

In life, Sigmar stood for the unification of Mankind, the destruction of evil and defiance against corruption. You hold the path set for you in his example high in your mind. To be a Priest of His faith is to be a Shepard to all mankind. Many of the cloth remain in their temples and cathedrals but you know the truth; the cursed and the damned must be sought out and vanquished.

Sired by Abhorash, the Blood Knight is a dark mockery of everything noble or virtuous that can be said about their mortal counterparts. Where before the Blood Kiss there was honour is now cruelty; faith turns to irreverence and duty falls to wanton ambition. This is true of all vampires but seems particularly tragic for the fallen knights of the Old World.

Known and feared by many names, Vampires are the nights dark master. Nighly anyone be they Man or Beast, Holy or Daemonic can face one and survive. All Vampires strive to be the only masters of their unlife, free from any obligations to religions or masters. This egomaniacal drive is what fuels them to greater and greater ambitions, so that one day they may be lord of all they observe.

To be a Man in the 25th century is to be one of thousands. The Old World finds itself on the precipice of destruction and turmoil, of chaos and death. No one in this age can be weak; some use the times to their advantage and turn warfare into wealth, combat into glory and tragedy into destiny. Mercenary they may call you, whatever the name no one will control your fate.

To be a knight of Bretonnia is to strive for the blessing of the Lady and her holy grail. Any man deemed worthy to sup from her chalice becomes a holy warrior honored and respected across all of Bretonnia and yet farther. The road to that goal is difficult, so much so that most knights fail to accomplish despite all sharing the same dream.

Damsels are sought out as children by the Fey Enchantress for their latent magical potential. Taken away from their families they are raised in secret to be potent guardians of fair Bretonnia. Upon completion of their training they embark out into the land, coming to the aid of the people and influencing knights in order to fulfill their martial potential.

The Warrior Priest unleashes Sigmars wrath for 8 seconds, which empowers him and the surrounding allies with 20% stronger melee attacks. Every point in Faith increases the melee effect by 0.05% and the duration by 0.05 seconds. The ability recharges by taking 50% of damage of total health. Blocked damage counts as 10% of the damage taken.
